title: Bloomberg Markets: Zaccarelli Eyeing Earnings and Valuations
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Zaccarelli Eyeing Earnings and Valuations
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Chris Zaccarelli\u0010Chief Investment Officer\u0010Cornerstone Financial Partners \u0010Discussing investor's concerns over all-time highs in the markets and his belief that earnings and valuations are more important than the level of equtities.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
